alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:51AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mississippi, central Tipton and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1051 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Osceola, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Osceola, Luxora, Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Brighton, Fulton, Ft Pillow, Atoka, Henning, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Egypt, Driver, Grider, Carson Lake, Rotan, Idaville and Chilson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
